choices.B: a VMware vCenter virtual machine virtual interface

questions.question_text: Which two options are valid for Layer 3 connectivity between Cisco Nexus 1000V Series VSM and VEM? (Choose two.)
Which option accurately describes updating vNICs templates?

choices.B: requires that the same VLANs be enabled on all service profiles and Cisco UCS Fabric Interconnects
choices.D: can be used to add or remove VLANs from all of the associated service profiles
choices.C: requires that STP be enabled on all service profiles and Cisco UCS Fabric Interconnects
choices.A: can be used to automate the configuration of STP

discussion.content:
Agreed. Correct answer is D.
"Configuring vNICs using vNIC templates provides a scalable way of configuring network connectivity for servers. This approach is practical for virtualization hosts because it allows very easy addition and removal of VLANs. Once you change the template, the newly added VLANs are added to all vNICs that were created from the template, on all hosts."

Correct answer: C
Corresponding to the link: The service graph is always associated with a contract between two EPGs.

Correct Answer: C Explanation: Figure 3 of: 
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/collateral/data-center-virtualization/application-centric-infrastructure/white-paper-c11-734298.html

questions.question_text: Service graphs are used to define which option on the Cisco ACI platform?

choices.D: the Cisco APIC definitions of the contracts in REST API
choices.A: a function that a contract must use to get to another contract
choices.B: a function that an EPG must use to get to another EPG

choices.A: Configure a port channel between the Fabric Interconnect and the IOM.
choices.C: Configure static pining to the uplink port in the server profile.
choices.D: Configure dynamic pinning to the uplink port in the server profile.
choices.E: Configure a vPC between the Fabric Interconnect and the IOM.
choices.B: Implement a QoS policy that has a policy bandwidth and assign the policy to a server profile.

questions.question_text: You have a Cisco UCS B-Series Blade Server chassis connected, which has four 10-Gbps connections to Cisco UCS Fabric Interconnect A. You plan to deploy a blade that has ESXi installed. You must provide a dedicated 10-Gbps uplink to the blade. Which two actions should you perform? (Choose two.)
In a three-tier SAN topology, which network layer should you connect the SAN initiators to?

discussion.content: C is correct. If the question was referring to targets, then the answer would be A.
